name: Ancestor Froggo
description:
The Frog Bard needs your help! 

There's a TADDY STORM brewing. They're falling from the sky! 

Use your mouse or phone screen to draw a path for Ancestor Froggo's tongue. Don't let the TADDIES hit FLIES or the ground before they evolve into FROGGOS. Careful though, there's a limited amount of time Ancestor Froggo's tongue can remain in this plane of existence. 

Tap the Ancestor Froggo icon at the top of the page to open the menu! 

All graphics either created or CC0. All music/sound either created or CC0.
